column5: I think I got it now lets hope Enjoy these are the follows misses and musky I landed that day
wow - awesome day.  some great video there.
Wow mike I love the footage - the first one why would she not eat!!!! (fishgreg has a tip to help!) Great day
Great footage Mike !!! Awesome stick handleing too
Some great action Mike. And on top water to boot! I like the footage you got of them too.  Cheers, Ron...
well done mike. guys that shows l.st clair is great for casting also,or mike trained them fish.
Thanks all I'm happy with the way it turned out I just need to remember where to put the rod and my hands or try to angle the camera differently when boat side or during the figure 8.
That's really cool Mike, very clear video.  Awesome
Looks like fun Mike    Great job on the video    Enjoyed it
Great video. I have always wanted to get out on St. Clair. Seems like such a productive fishery. Thanks for posting
That is an awesome video. I can't wait to go musky fishing.
I want to get another Gopro with the dive housing and have it recording underwater just beside the boat most days you can see to the bottom. Even in the stained water that day I had 3' I could see.
here I thought I was the only guy crazy enough to fish musky barefoot! Great video

It's funny the looks I get in November when I am out there in cutoffs and shorts. The best was when I was telling the MNR I thought they were crazy going out when the weather was so bad it was blowing the lake had 3-4' waves and I was heading out in my summer cloths both MNR officers looked at me like I was nuts
Great video Mike!! Some fantastic footage there.
